sentence.Network_en: Rotation of picea asperata for pulpwood was tentatively determined as 25 year.

sentence.Network_en: Gorals seldom feed on Pinus koraiensis, Picea jezoensis, Abies nephralepis ( 1 %, 0.7 % and 1.7 % , respectively ).

sentence.Network_en: It mainly attacks Picea jezoensis and causes a white rot of root and butt.
sentence.Network_cn: 该病主要发生于成熟林分,造成干基特别是根部腐朽.
